TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GetManifestCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: Fournit des données pour l'événement de .

span.span: Provides data for the event of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Utilisez pour obtenir des informations sur un [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application une fois que les manifestes de déploiement et d’application ont été téléchargées.Use to obtain information about a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application after the deployment and application manifests have been downloaded. ## Examples L’exemple de code suivant montre comment utiliser pour installer un [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application par programmation sur un ordinateur client.The following code example shows how to use to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client machine. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivationContext As ActivationContext
public: property ActivationContext ^ ActivationContext { ActivationContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtient le contexte pour l’application [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] active.

span.span: Gets the context for the current [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.

value.span: Objet représentant le contexte de l'application actuelle.

span.span: An object representing the context for the current application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationIdentity As ApplicationIdentity
public: property ApplicationIdentity ^ ApplicationIdentity { ApplicationIdentity ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets a description of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
An object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationManifest As XmlReader
public: property System::Xml::XmlReader ^ ApplicationManifest { System::Xml::XmlReader ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtient le manifeste d’application [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] pour ce déploiement.

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application manifest for this deployment.
An representing the application manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Vous pouvez utiliser cette variable pour récupérer toutes les informations vous avez besoin à partir du manifeste d’application, telles qu’une liste de dépendances, les informations de confidentialité et ainsi de suite.You can use this variable to grab any information you need from the application manifest, such as a list of dependencies, trust information, and so on. Pour plus d’informations sur la structure de ce document, consultez [manifeste d’Application ClickOnce](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243).For more information on the structure of this document, see [ClickOnce Application Manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243). ## Examples L’exemple de code suivant montre comment examiner un manifeste d’application à partir d’un Gestionnaire d’événements pour déterminer si l’application requiert une confiance totale par défaut.The following code example shows how to examine an application manifest from within a event handler to determine whether the application requires full trust by default. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

public: property Uri ^ SupportUri { Uri ^ get(); };
